Job Title: Retail Operations Specialist

Location: New York City Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
180 the STORE - OPERATIONS ASSISTANT
JOB DESCRIPTION
180 the Store, a 5,000 square foot luxury retail/lifestyle store/event space in Tribeca, is expanding and seeks an experienced, detail-orientated, professional OPERATIONS Specialist to help manage the New York and Hamptons store. The position will work directly with the CEO and Accountant to assist in managing the business's day-to-day operations and to ensure that company procedures are followed.
The Accountant must possess in-depth knowledge of Shopify and experience in the Fashion and Luxury Market. They must have outstanding communication skills and be extremely organized and detail-oriented. This position will oversee all operational aspects of the store and shipments. This position will also be responsible for ordering supplies, entering store stock, general bookkeeping, conducting employee orientation, and inventory management. This individual must be proficient with Shopify.
RESPONSIBILITIES:
Work directly with the CEO and on managing the day-to-day operations of the companyEnter all shipments into our Shopify POS systemUpdate website and e-commerceOversee photoshoots for e-commerceArrange transfer of merchandise between storesEnsure that the sales floor is restocked and that the stockroom is organized and maintainedFollowing up on all shipments and special orders by customersAddress daily customer email inquiriesManage and update the 180 the Store manual and procedures.Manage and oversee all opening and closing procedures and ensure that they are followed through dailyManaging and correcting employees' work time records, vacations, and sick time.Conduct inventoryGeneral Journal - daily income reconciliations between Shopify store and online transactions and bank account depositsMaintaining google sheet “180 sales day by day” for daily and monthly,Organize and manage orders by designer placed each season
REQUIREMENTS
Must have 3 to 4 years of Accounting experience within the Fashion Retail Industry.Must be proficient with Shopify and QuickbooksMust have strong communication skills
Only qualified Applicants should apply with a cover letter and resume to Denise@180thestore.com

Experience Level (if available): None
